title: Let’s End Family Violence
description: We believe that strong families and empowered youth are the foundation of a thriving society. Through our Supportive Parenting and Financial Literacy programs, we equip parents and caregivers with the skills to nurture safe, supportive, and resilient families. Recognizing the potential of Cambodia’s youth, we have expanded our work to include Youth Empowerment, focusing on entrepreneurship, sustainable job placement, and small business development models. By providing practical skills, mentorship, and financial education, we help young people build brighter futures and contribute meaningfully to their communities. Together, we are fostering a future where every child, parent, and young entrepreneur has the opportunity to grow and succeed.
